name: casa-petrada
description: Casa Petrada - Handmade Boho Jewelry & Fashion E-commerce Website

scripts.backend: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && uvicorn main:app --reload
scripts.install:all: cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.clean: find . -name '__pycache__' -type d -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null || true && find . -name '*.pyc' -delete 2>/dev/null || true

author: Casa Petrada
